DOC.brief_summary: The PI develop self-directed program treat late-life anxiety call Breathing , Relaxation , Education Anxiety Treatment Home Environment ( BREATHE ) . This program consist weekly video lesson participant watch digital video disc ( DVD ) along weekly telephone check-in . In BREATHE participant learn two behavioral intervention : diaphragmatic breathing progressive muscle relaxation ( PMR ) . The purpose study examine whether self-directed BREATHE program superior wait list control reduce anxiety old adult anxiety disorder . For assigned wait list control , offer opportunity participate BREATHE treatment 8 week wait list .
